#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>

using namespace std;

int T, N, A[1000];

int main()
{
	//ifstream cin ("main.in");

	int temp, i, ans, cur;

	cin >> T;
	while (T--)
	{
		cin >> N;

		i = 0;
		while (i < N)
		{
			cin >> temp;

			A[temp]++;

			i++;
		}

		i = 0;
		while (i < N)
		{
			cin >> temp;

			A[temp]--;

			i++;
		}

		ans = 0;
		cur = 0;
		i = 1;
		while (i <= 1000)
		{
			cur += A[i];
			A[i] = 0;

			ans = ans > cur ? ans : cur;

			i++;
		}

		cout << ans << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
